project.name: TBI-MLLM: Tripartite Architectural Innovation for Bilingual MLLMs
project.description: Architectural innovations (vision encoder, projector, decoder merging) for Korean+English MLLM based on InternVLM

hypothesis.notes: Original tripartite hypothesis (25+ papers) + NEW vision encoder focused hypothesis with comprehensive survey (50+ papers covering 18 MLLM architectures, 14 vision encoders, 27 feature extraction methods, 12 models' training data). Focus: InternViT modernization with 2D-RoPE, window attention, spatial features.

experiment_design.notes: Comprehensive design with 16 experiments (A0-F4) across vision encoder, projector, and decoder ablations. 3-phase training protocol defined. Feasible on 2x A100-40GB with DeepSpeed ZeRO-2. NOTE: Vision encoder hypothesis may require updated experiment design.

experiment_run.notes: 4-node cluster (8x A100-40GB). Conda env ready with core packages. Pending: flash-attn install, worker node setup, NCCL test, model/data download, training scripts.
